titles.title: Wage Increase Fairness Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to prohibit States and municipalities from adopting certain laws and ordinances, and for other purposes.
Wage Increase Fairness Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Wage Increase Fairness Act
This bill prohibits a state or municipality from establishing minimum wage requirements that treat independently owned franchises differently than other businesses based on the status of such franchises under federal law as distinct enterprises from their franchisors.
